DOC.brief_summary: This study base positive result open label trial mesenchymal stem cell therapy patient Multiple System Atrophy ( MSA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Autologous Mesenchymal Stem Cells Patients With Multiple System Atrophy
DOC.criteria: 75 Years Old Less Multiple System Atrophy Voluntary Participants Doubted dementia ( MMSE < 24 ) Severe febrile condition Serum SGOT/SGPT three time Malignant mass
